content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
I told you it's Sharp! You take 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Melee
Klutz You drop the weapon you used.

Ranged
Stop hitting Yourself You hit yourself instead of the target.

Unarmed
Not me, you Fool! You hit the ally nearest to the target.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #26
